name: Snake eyes (RetroSpektakels)
description:
Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

In "Snake eyes" your goal it to- well, roll snake eyes!
Which is easy enough because you can control the rolling of the dice yourself.
Though, the board layout makes it a bit tricky sometimes...
And I thought snake eyes involved only two dice!

This prototype includes 10 puzzels to solve.
Can you figure it out?

How to play
Move the dice using the arrow keys (or WASD).
Each time you do the number of eyes on each die decreases.
All dice must land on "one" at the same time on designated tiles.
